description:
Years ago I meet my wife on online till her passing a few years ago. After that I took some time for myself and I’m now finally going to give it another try. So I figured why not try POF maybe I’ll get lucky.

Hopefully I’ll find someone I connect with inside and outside the bedroom. I’m very open minded and hopefully I’ll meet someone like.

Like the care bears said, “ Sharing is Caring.”

Now that may be a little to much for some woman but why not send a message anyways. You just never know what might happen.
